solution_line_template: Before the purchase, Bert had {stamps_bought} * {fraction_before} = <<{stamps_bought}*{fraction_before}={stamps_before_purchase}>>{stamps_before_purchase} stamps.
So after the purchase he has {stamps_bought} + {stamps_before_purchase} = <<{stamps_bought}+{stamps_before_purchase}={total_stamps}>>{total_stamps} stamps.
